Imo-Awka<https://orientdailynews.com.ng/cover-story/anambra-capital-shut-imoka-festival//> m'obu Imo Ǫka bu èrimerè puru įche ndi Awka n'eri
Ana-akpokwa ya erimeri Umu Ǫka (Umu Awka festival)

Ǫka bu isi Obodo steetí Anambra di n'ime Naijiria.<https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Awka/>
Erimeri imo Ǫka n'adi kari n'onwa May<https://orientdailynews.com.ng/geopolis/south-east/imo-awka-deity-protects//> afo-obura.
